Job Title: Production Specialist/Supervisor (Swing Shift) - $30.75/hr.

Location: Molalla, OR

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Production Specialist/Supervisor (Day Shift) - $30.75/hr.

Who we are looking for: 

Atkore, a recent recipient of a Great Place to Work© certification, for the 3rd year in a row, is currently searching for a Production Specialist/Supervisor for the Swing shift - to be based out of Molalla, OR. Bi-lingual (Spanish-English) strongly preferred. The ideal candidate will have a high school diploma or equivalent. Prior success as a Production Specialist or equivalent position at Atkore International and experience in lean manufacturing or a business system-based company is a plus.

What you’ll do:

Ensure implementation and adherence to health and safety proceduresAnalyze and report department performance on production volume and qualityProactively identify and implement process and quality improvements and initiate corrective and/or preventive actions when out of complianceCoach and mentor shift leadsSchedule and manage the production team within area of responsibility; Support/implement training programs to ensure employees are trained and in compliance with all procedures; coach and counsel to improve results, conduct ongoing performance appraisalsLiaison with employees and management teams to identify ways to continually foster and promote a positive and safe work environment by direct involvement with all levels of employeesEnsure efficient collaboration and coordination between relevant departmentsAll other duties as assigned


What you'll bring: 

Bi-lingual Spanish-English strongly preferred.High School diploma or equivalent is required. Minimum of 2 years in manufacturing is required, Management experience is a plus; MUST be a team leader with strong leadership skillsExcellent interpersonal and communication skillsComputer literacy and experience with Windows, Excel, Word, and OutlookStrong understanding of basic math required for quick and accurate counting and calculationsAbility to manage a variety of concurrent tasks in a fast-paced work environmentAttention to detail, time management, planning, and organizational skillsEffective decision making and problem solving abilitiesStrong initiative and adaptable to changeMust be able to thrive in a team environmentAbility to lift 50 pounds unassistedNeed to be detail oriented and have safe work practiceAll associates must embrace and foster and environment that supports our core values of Accountability, Teamwork, Integrity, Respect and Excellence.Safety Toes Shoes Required 


Within 3 months, you’ll:

Complete any required training.Have developed relationships with the key stakeholders for this role.Be well-versed in Atkore’s Business System and the importance of your role to daily operations.


Atkore is a four-time Great Place to Work© certified company and a two-time Top Workplaces USA award winner! We’re committed to creating an engaged, aligned workforce driven by a collaborative culture. Our team strives for breakthrough results and stays focused on being standout leaders. We consistently live the Atkore mission, strategic priorities, and behaviors consistent with our core values.

Join our team and align yourself with an industry leader!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
